full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I GTER MDZOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B CES KHRO BO'I DBANG PO RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I ZHI RGYAS DBANG GSUM GYI SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I GTER MDZOD ZHES BYA BA 'DI [???] SNGA SOD 'DI KHAR RIM BRA'I CHED DU SGRUB DGOS SKABS MGO SMOS TZAM [???] @018A *, ,SLAR ZHIB RGYAS ZHIG RTZOM 'DUN YOD THOG ,DA LAM DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO MKHAN PO BLO BZANG YE SHES NAS, RTA MGRIN GSANG MA'I LUGS KYI SBYIN SREG CHOG SGRIGS RGYAS PA ZHIG GTAN NAS MI 'DUG PAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN BDE'I CHED DU BSKUL MA GNANG BA LTAR, PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG SGRUB THABS DANG SBYIN SREG MDOR BSDUS TZAM ZHIG 'DUG PA GSUNG 'BUM DU BZHUGS PA DE RNAMS GZHIR BYAS STE, RANG GIS KYANG LHAG BSAM DANG BA'I YID KYIS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RGYAL SRAS SPUL SKUR 'BOD PA BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE'I 'DU BYED RAB BRTAN MING CAN GYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,
